springcodingtonportal.controller
Class PlaceController

java.lang.Object
  springcodingtonportal.controller.PlaceController

@Controller
public class PlaceController
extends java.lang.Object

Place controller handles all the place related transactions with the data classes.

@RequestMapping(value="/registerPlace.htm")
public org.springframework.web.servlet.ModelAndView regisertPlace(javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                 javax.servlet.http.HttpServletResponse response)
                                                           throws java.lang.Exception
jsp call this function by the name "registerPlace.htm". If the request or response is null, it sends an exception. If they are non null, a list of existing type of place is taken from the database and adds to the form to create a new place.
